message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $150. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I think the product is worth more than $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $125?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $130. This is as low as I'm willing to go, though. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $129. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $127?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $128. This is my final offer. What do you think?
